document_data.name: Lesser Distraction
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lesser distraction''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[ninja]]s. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: Ninja used this spell to distract a target. The target of the spell saw an ill-defined image on the periphery of their vision or heard an imperceptible noise. The ninja was able to choose on casting whether the spell would be auditory- or visual-based, but was unable to control how the spell manifested or the distance.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic component|somatic]] component, [[kuji-kiri]] hand gestures.
